item.title: Sed on File Pattern
item.description:
This command edits all files matching the pattern deployment* and prepends

      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: false

before that reads nodeSelector:.

find -type f -name "deployment*" | xargs -I "%" sed -i 's/      nodeSelector:/      securityContext:\n        runAsNonRoot: false\n&/g' "%"

Before

    spec:
      nodeSelector:
        usage: "data"
      containers:

After

    spec:
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: false
      nodeSelector:
        usage: "data"
      containers:

item.title: Bulk Cancel of CircleCI Jobs
item.description:
Hopefully you will never need this. Below is a small fish script that will cancel CircleCI jobs that are running/pending.

for num in (seq 126 813)
    curl "https://circleci.com/api/v1.1/project/github/denniswebb/denniswebb.info/$num/cancel?circle-token=$CIRCLE_TOKEN" -XPOST
end

seq 126 813 is used to set the start and end numbers for the loop CIRCLE_TOKEN is set to your CircleCI API token Replace denniswebb with your GitHub organization name. Replace dennniswebb.info with your repository name.

item.title: Sorting AWS cli describe-images using jq
item.description:
To query AWS for a list of AMIs based on filter criteria sorted by date:

aws ec2 describe-images --filters "Name=root-device-type,Values=ebs","Name=name,Values=amzn-ami-hvm-*" --owners=amazon | jq '.Images | sort_by(.CreationDate) | .[] | {Name: .Name, Created: .CreationDate, Id: .ImageId}'

item.title: Kubernets Pod Logs to Elasticsearch
item.description:
While troubleshooting why some pod logs weren’t being pushed to Elasticsearch by Fluentd on our clusters. I suspected that the format of the logs themselves were the issue. After a bit of work I came up with this solution:

kubectl logs <PODNAME> | jq -c '. | {"index": {}}, .' | curl https://<ELASTICSEARCH_ADDRESS>/<INDEX>/<TYPE>/_bulk --data-bin @-

Below is a sample response from sending the last 5 log messages from a pod:

kubectl logs nginx-2450266744-btprh --tail=5 | jq -c '. | {"index": {}}, .' | curl https://es.denniswebb.info/logs/nginx/_bulk --data-bin @-
